channel.title: Wireless Medical Telemetry Service on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Wireless Medical Telemetry Service on 0x000216

item.title: Medicine in the White Spaces
item.description:
There’s a lot of interest in the unused portions of the old analog TV spectrum, known as “white spaces.” While telecommunications companies are already utilizing parts of the 700 MHz band, the focus has shifted to these white spaces for potential applications. Medical telemetry, which uses wireless technology for medical equipment like heart monitors, already occupies a portion of this spectrum. Specifically, Channel 37 (608-614 MHz) has been dedicated to medical telemetry since 2000...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/medicine-in-the-white-spaces/
